Namespace : YuguLibrary.Enumerations Assembly : Assembly-CSharp.dll Syntax public enum DelegateFlags Remarks Skill and mechanic logic are defined through delegate functions, and attached to units using HookFunction objects with a defining DelegateFlag. The logic runs when the system alerts their defined flag. Fields Name Description OnApply Checked after a HookFunction is attached to a unit. OnEncounterRoundEnd OnEncounterRoundStart OnEncounterTurnEnd OnEncounterTurnStart OnHP0 Checked when a unit's currentHP reaches 0. OnIncapacitation Checked after a unit recceives Incapacitation status. OnRemove Checked before a HookFunction is removed from a unit.
